summary: This document is a bank statement for Shocker Holdings LLC for the period of October 1, 2017, to October 31, 2017. It details the account activity including deposits, withdrawals, and service charges, showing an ending balance of $1,921.43.

persons.name: Carlo Gonzales
persons.context: Carlo Gonzales is identified as the relationship manager for the account holder, Shocker Holdings LLC.

keyFacts: The account for Shocker Holdings LLC had a beginning balance of $946.93 and an ending balance of $1,921.43.
There were two checks totaling $10,000.00 and three withdrawals/debits totaling $10,025.50 during the statement period.
A service charge of $25.50 was withdrawn on 10/12/17.
The document indicates a gap in the check sequence.
